alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:19PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Todd and southeastern Bennett Counties through 445 PM MDT/545 PM CDT/... At 419 PM MDT/519 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Nenzel, or 30 miles east of Martin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spring Creek around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Saint Francis and Two Strike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/ for south central and southwestern South Dakota.
